home.description: Passionate developer, with solid experience in different languages, as well as in different areas. I'm currently looking for my first work experience in the world of development.

about.p1: I have developed my entire professional life in administrative fields, until I decided in 2020 to change my life and start studying something that I have always really liked and caught my attention, which is programming in general.
about.p2: I'm currently 7 subjects away from receiving a University Technician in Programming at the National Technological University.
about.p3: Characterized by being a persevering person in the face of any challenge in the workplace, always trying to provide solutions to the problems raised.

portfolio.projDescription: Project carried out as a final project for the subject Laboratory III, of the University Technique in Programming [UTN]. It was developed entirely individually.
